content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (2.0, 0.0)) with an inventory containing iron-ore and iron-plate.

### Stone furnace at position (4, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (4.0, 0.0)) with an inventory containing iron-ore and iron-plate.

### Stone furnace at position (6, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (6.0, 0.0)) with an inventory containing iron-ore and iron-plate.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure your inventory has enough space before attempting to insert items into a furnace. If the inventory is full, the insertion will fail.
  
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
